page.title: 12Theatre and Religion
page.content: Most people we talked to went to the theatre sometime. Half went between four and twelve times a year the rest about once a year. Most people went to the theatre in London. Harlow and then Cambridge were next most popular places. Interest was taken in comedies, musicals, thrillers and Shakespeare. {* Religion *} Mr Rose is the vicar of St'Johns chuch There are 18 services a week and about twelve weddings a year and 35 baptisums in a year He believes Heaven and Hell are relationships with GOD being close to Him or not. Father David is the priest of St. Theresas church. He has about 400 catholics in his parish. There are about 28 baptisms a year and a few weddings.
